mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (visit_id, user_id, menu_id, store_id, content, is_public, image_url, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{review.visitId}, #{review.userId}, #{review.menuId}, #{review.storeId}, #{review.content}, #{review.isPublic}, #{review.imageUrl}, NULL, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET content = #{review.content}, is_public = #{review.isPublic}, image_url = #{review.imageUrl}, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{review.id}
